turns.content: Make a fun song about Oh Hee-jung

Verse 1:
Oh Hee-jung, she's a star
A shining light, wherever she are
With a smile so bright, and a heart so pure
She brings joy to everyone, that's for sure

Chorus:
Oh Hee-jung, she's got the magic
Making everyone feel so fantastic
With her laughter and her grace
She lights up the whole place

Verse 2:
She dances to the beat of her own drum
And when she sings, it's like a sweet hum
Her talents, they never cease to amaze
She's got style and she's got class, in so many ways

Chorus:
Oh Hee-jung, she's got the magic
Making everyone feel so fantastic
With her laughter and her grace
She lights up the whole place

Bridge:
She's a true inspiration, in all she does
She spreads love, and it never stops
And when the world gets rough and tough
She shows us how to rise above

Chorus:
Oh Hee-jung, she's got the magic
Making everyone feel so fantastic
With her laughter and her grace
She lights up the whole place

Outro:
Oh Hee-jung, she's a shining light
Bringing joy and happiness, day and night
She's a star, in everyone's eyes
And we love her, till the end of time!
